Class CellPhone

java.lang.Object
COMP249_A3.CellPhone
public class CellPhone extends Object
The COMP249_A3.CellPhone class represents a cell phone with attributes such as serial number, brand, year of manufacture, and price.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CellPhone(long serialNum, String brand, int year, double price)
    Constructs a new COMP249_A3.CellPhone with the specified serial number, brand, year, and price.
    CellPhone(CellPhone phone, long newSerialNum)
    Constructs a copy of the specified COMP249_A3.CellPhone object with a new serial number.

  • Constructor Details

    • CellPhone

      public CellPhone(long serialNum, String brand, int year, double price)
      Constructs a new COMP249_A3.CellPhone with the specified serial number, brand, year, and price.
      Parameters:
      serialNum - the serial number of the cell phone
      brand - the brand of the cell phone
      year - the manufacturing year of the cell phone
      price - the price of the cell phone

    • CellPhone

      public CellPhone(CellPhone phone, long newSerialNum)
      Constructs a copy of the specified COMP249_A3.CellPhone object with a new serial number.
      Parameters:
      phone - the COMP249_A3.CellPhone object to copy
      newSerialNum - the new serial number for the copied phone
